##load the dataset and libraries
```{r}
data(iris)
library(plotly)
library(bindrcpp)
```
##plot a chart using plotly
```{r}
plot_ly(iris, x = ~Petal.Length, y = ~Petal.Width,color = ~Species, mode = "markers")

```
